title: Admin/Staff delivered controls removal, Admin Delivered bulk hallmark action, and Admin dashboard tab/card color styling

requirements.summary: Remove/disable any Staff/Admin UI that can mark orders as delivered so only Karigar portal can perform delivered updates.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard pages do not present a button/action that triggers a status change to "delivered".
Staff dashboard pages do not present a button/action that triggers a status change to "delivered".
If any legacy Staff/Admin control remains visible for workflow reasons, it must be disabled and show a clear, English explanation that only Karigar can mark delivered (no backend call attempted).

file_operations.description: Remove the Staff "Mark as Delivered" bulk action and related selection-driven delivered workflow (including disabling/removing any dialog wiring that would trigger delivered status updates) so Staff cannot initiate delivered status changes from the UI.
Confirm Admin UI has no delivered status-changing controls; ensure no delivered action buttons are introduced in any Admin tab while implementing other requested changes.

requirements.summary: Add bulk selection + "Give to Hallmark" action to Admin Delivered tab using the existing bulk status update flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Delivered tab supports selecting one or more rows (checkbox selection) similar to the Total Orders tab selection UI.
Delivered tab includes an action button that sets the selected delivered ordersâ€™ status to "given_to_hallmark" using the existing bulk status update flow.
After a successful update, the selected orders are no longer shown in the Delivered tab list and appear under the Hallmark tab (because of existing tab filtering by status).
A success toast is shown indicating how many orders were updated; failures show an error toast message in English.
The existing Delivered tab filters (karigar/status/date/orderNo/CO/RB filters) continue to work.

file_operations.description: Implement Delivered-tab row selection (checkboxes) by enabling OrdersTable selectionMode for the Delivered tab and maintaining a Delivered-specific selected set; add a Delivered-tab bulk action button to set selected orders to "given_to_hallmark" via the existing useBulkUpdateOrderStatus mutation, with success/error toasts and selection reset on completion.

requirements.summary: Add distinct accent colors to Admin dashboard metric cards and a colored active-tab indicator/slider styling for Admin dashboard tabs.
acceptanceCriteria: Each of the four Admin dashboard metric cards has a distinct, consistent accent color (e.g., title/accent bar/badge/background tint) while preserving readability and existing layout.
The Admin dashboard TabsList/TabsTrigger styling clearly shows the active tab with a colored indicator/underline/slider bar, and inactive tabs have a visually distinct state.
No edits are made to immutable Shadcn UI component source files; styling is applied via page-level className overrides and/or global Tailwind styles in allowed files.
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Apply page-level Tailwind className styling to the four metric cards (Orders in View, Customer Orders, Active Karigars, Total Weight) to give each a distinct accent (e.g., border/top accent + subtle background tint), and add TabsList/TabsTrigger className overrides to show a colored active indicator/underline and clear inactive states without modifying shadcn/ui component source.

Add minimal global Tailwind/CSS helpers (within existing layers) to support Admin dashboard tab indicator/slider styling and/or reusable metric-card accent styles if needed, ensuring readability in light/dark modes.
